body.p: Kentucky farmer and soldier. Married to Sarah Johnson Barber. Father of Gennetta Barber, Louisiana A. Barber, Landers Barber, Lewis Barber, George William Barber, John J. Barber, and Louvena Mary A. Barber. Served as captain of the Twenty-fourth Kentucky Volunteer Infantry (Co. D) from December 1861 to January 1865. Served as a captain in Captain Barberâ€™s Company (Fleming County State Guard) from June 1865 to November 1865.
